techmeme.title: Sources: Apple execs have held internal discussions about bidding for, or partnering with, Perplexity, seeking to address the need for more AI talent and tech (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Cluely, which wants to help users "cheat on everything", including job interviews and exams, raised a $15M Series A led by a16z, two months after a $5.3M seed (Marina Temkin/TechCrunch)
Amazon ends an experiment started in 2023 to make same-day deliveries with drivers in Kia Souls and will rely on Amazon Flex drivers who use their own cars (Matt Day/Bloomberg)
Anthropic's test of 16 top AI models from OpenAI and others found that, in some cases, they resorted to malicious behavior to avoid replacement or achieve goals (Ina Fried/Axios)
NYC announces new minimum-pay rules for rideshare drivers, settling on a 5% increase after Uber and Lyft strongly opposed a proposed 6.1% pay hike (Natalie Lung/Bloomberg)
